question_en: A company makes forecasts each quarter to decide how to optimize operations to meet expected demand. The company uses ML models to make these forecasts. options_en.A: Build an automatic named entity recognition system.

question_en: A company is using domain-specific models. The company wants to avoid creating new models from the beginning. The company instead wants to adapt pre-trained models to create models for new, related tasks. Which ML strategy meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司正在使用特定领域模型，希望避免从头开始创建新模型，而是通过调整预训练模型来为新的相关任务构建模型。哪种机器学习策略能满足这些需求？

question_en: A company is building a solution to generate images for protective eyewear. The solution must have high accuracy and must minimize the risk of incorrect annotations. Which solution will meet these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司正在构建一个防护眼镜图像生成解决方案，要求该方案具备高准确率且最大限度降低错误标注的风险。哪种解决方案能满足这些需求？

options_en.A: Human-in-the-loop validation by using Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth Plus
options_en.B: Data augmentation by using an Amazon Bedrock knowledge base
options_en.C: Image recognition by using Amazon Rekognition
options_en.D: Data summarization by using Amazon QuickSight Q

options_cn.A: 使用Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth Plus进行人在回路验证
options_cn.B: 使用Amazon Bedrock知识库进行数据增强

question_en: A company wants to create a chatbot by using a foundation model (FM) on Amazon Bedrock. The FM needs to access encrypted data that is stored in an Amazon S3 bucket. The data is encrypted with Amazon S3 managed keys (SSES3)｡ The FM encounters a failure when attempting to access the S3 bucket data. Which solution will meet these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司希望在Amazon Bedrock上使用基础模型（FM）构建聊天机器人，该FM需要访问存储在Amazon S3存储桶中的加密数据（数据使用Amazon S3托管密钥SSE-S3加密），但FM在尝试访问S3存储桶数据时失败。哪种解决方案能满足需求？

options_en.A: Ensure that the role that Amazon Bedrock assumes has permission to decrypt data with the correct encryption key.
options_en.B: Set the access permissions for the S3 buckets to allow public access to enable access over the internet.
options_en.C: Use prompt engineering techniques to tell the model to look for information in Amazon S3.
options_en.D: Ensure that the S3 data does not contain sensitive information.

options_cn.A: 确保Amazon Bedrock所扮演的角色拥有使用正确加密密钥解密数据的权限
options_cn.B: 设置S3存储桶的访问权限为允许公共访问，以通过互联网访问数据
options_cn.C: 使用提示词工程技术告知模型去Amazon S3中查找信息
options_cn.D: 确保S3中的数据不包含敏感信息

question_en: A company wants to use language models to create an application for inference on edge devices. The inference must have the lowest latency possible. Which solution will meet these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司希望使用语言模型构建一个边缘设备推理应用，且要求推理具备尽可能低的延迟。哪种解决方案能满足这些需求？

options_en.B: Deploy optimized large language models (LLMs) on edge devices.
options_en.C: Incorporate a centralized small language model (SLM) API for asynchronous communication with edge devices.
options_en.D: Incorporate a centralized large language model (LLM) API for asynchronous communication with edge devices.

options_cn.A: 在边缘设备上部署优化后的小型语言模型（SLMs）
options_cn.B: 在边缘设备上部署优化后的大型语言模型（LLMs）
options_cn.C: 集成集中式小型语言模型（SLM）API，与边缘设备进行异步通信
options_cn.D: 集成集中式大型语言模型（LLM）API，与边缘设备进行异步通信

question_en: A company wants to develop an educational game where users answer questions such as the following:"A jar contains six red, four green, and three yellow marbles. What is the probability of choosing a green marble from the jar?" Which solution meets these requirements with the LEAST operational overhead?

options_en.A: Use supervised learning to create a regression model that will predict probability.
options_en.B: Use reinforcement learning to train a model to return the probability.
options_en.C: Use code that will calculate probability by using simple rules and computations.
options_en.D: Use unsupervised learning to create a model that will estimate probability density.

question_cn: 某公司计划使用Amazon Bedrock构建生成式AI应用，需要选择基础模型（FM），且想知道单个提示词能容纳多少信息。哪项考量会影响该公司的决策？

question_en: A company wants to make a chatbot to help customers. The chatbot will help solve technical problems without human intervention. The company chose a foundation model (FM) for the chatbot. The chatbot needs to produce responses that adhere to company tone. Which solution meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司希望打造一款客服聊天机器人，该机器人需能在无人工干预的情况下解决技术问题，且已为其选定基础模型（FM）。要求机器人的回复需符合公司的语气风格，哪种解决方案能满足需求？

options_en.A: Set a low limit on the number of tokens the FM can produce.
options_en.B: Use batch inferencing to process detailed responses.
options_en.C: Refine the prompt until the FM produces the desired responses.
options_en.D: Define a higher number for the temperature parameter.

options_cn.A: 对基础模型可生成的令牌数量设置较低限制
options_cn.B: 使用批量推理来处理详细回复
options_cn.C: 优化提示词直至基础模型生成符合预期的回复
options_cn.D: 为温度参数设置更高数值

question_en: A company wants to use a large language model (LLM) on Amazon Bedrock for sentiment analysis. The company wants to classify the sentiment of text passages as positive or negative. Which prompt engineering strategy meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司希望在Amazon Bedrock上使用大语言模型（LLM）进行情感分析，需将文本段落的情感分为积极或消极两类。哪种提示词工程策略能满足需求？

options_en.A: Provide examples of text passages with corresponding positive or negative labels in the prompt followed by the new text passage to be classified.
options_en.B: Provide a detailed explanation of sentiment analysis and how LLMs work in the prompt.
options_en.C: Provide the new text passage to be classified without any additional context or examples.
options_en.D: Provide the new text passage with a few examples of unrelated tasks, such as text summarization or question answering.

options_cn.A: 在提示词中提供带有对应积极/消极标签的文本示例，再附上待分类的新文本段落
options_cn.B: 在提示词中详细解释情感分析以及大语言模型的工作原理
options_cn.C: 仅提供待分类的新文本段落，不附带任何额外上下文或示例
options_cn.D: 在待分类文本旁附上一些无关任务的示例，如文本摘要或问答

question_en: A security company is using Amazon Bedrock to run foundation models (FMs). The company wants to ensure that only authorized users invoke the models. The company needs to identify any unauthorized access attempts to set appropriate AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies and roles for future iterations of the FMs. Which AWS service should the company use to identify unauthorized users that are trying to access Amazon Bedrock?
question_cn: 某安全公司正在使用Amazon Bedrock运行基础模型（FM），希望确保只有授权用户能调用模型，且需要识别未授权的访问尝试，以便为后续版本的基础模型设置合适的AWS身份与访问管理（IAM）策略和角色。该公司应使用哪项AWS服务来识别尝试访问Amazon Bedrock的未授权用户？

question_cn: 某AI公司会在独立软件供应商（ISV）的协助下定期评估其系统和流程，且希望在ISV的合规报告可用时收到邮件通知。该公司可使用哪项AWS服务来满足此需求？

question_en: A company wants to use a large language model (LLM) to develop a conversational agent. The company needs to prevent the LLM from being manipulated with common prompt engineering techniques to perform undesirable actions or expose sensitive information. Which action will reduce these risks?
question_cn: 某公司希望使用大语言模型（LLM）开发对话代理，需防止模型被常见的提示词工程技术操纵，从而执行不当操作或泄露敏感信息。哪种措施能降低此类风险？

options_en.A: Create a prompt template that teaches the LLM to detect attack patterns.
options_en.B: Increase the temperature parameter on invocation requests to the LLM.
options_en.C: Avoid using LLMs that are not listed in Amazon SageMaker.
options_en.D: Decrease the number of input tokens on invocations of the LLM.

options_cn.A: 创建提示词模板，教会大语言模型识别攻击模式
options_cn.B: 提高调用大语言模型时的温度参数
options_cn.C: 避免使用未在Amazon SageMaker中列出的大语言模型
options_cn.D: 减少调用大语言模型时的输入令牌数量

options_en.C: Refining an existing third-party generative AI foundation model (FM) by fine-tuning the model by using data specific to the business.
options_en.D: Building and training a generative AI model from scratch by using specific data that a customer owns.

options_cn.A: 使用内置生成式AI功能的第三方企业应用
options_cn.B: 基于现有第三方生成式AI基础模型（FM）构建应用
options_cn.C: 使用企业专属数据微调现有第三方生成式AI基础模型（FM）以优化模型

question_en: How can companies use large language models (LLMs) securely on Amazon Bedrock?
question_cn: 企业如何在Amazon Bedrock上安全使用大语言模型（LLM）？

question_en: A medical company deployed a disease detection model on Amazon Bedrock. To comply with privacy policies, the company wants to prevent the model from including personal patient information in its responses. The company also wants to receive notification when policy violations occur Which solution meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某医疗公司在Amazon Bedrock上部署了疾病检测模型，为遵守隐私政策，需防止模型在回复中包含患者个人信息，同时希望在出现政策违规时收到通知。哪种解决方案能满足需求？

options_en.A: Use Amazon Macie to scan the model's output for sensitive data and set up alerts for potential violations.
options_en.B: Configure AWS CloudTrail to monitor the model's responses and create alerts for any detected personal information.
options_en.C: Use Guardrails for Amazon Bedrock to filter content. Set up Amazon CloudWatch alarms for notification of policy violations.
options_en.D: Implement Amazon SageMaker Model Monitor to detect data drift and receive alerts when model quality degrades.

options_cn.A: 使用Amazon Macie扫描模型输出中的敏感数据，并为潜在违规设置警报。
options_cn.B: 配置AWS CloudTrail监控模型回复，对检测到的个人信息触发警报。
options_cn.C: 使用Amazon Bedrock内容防护机制过滤内容，同时配置Amazon CloudWatch警报以接收政策违规通知。
options_cn.D: 部署Amazon SageMaker模型监控工具检测数据漂移，并在模型质量下降时接收警报。

question_en: A company manually reviews all submitted resumes in PDF format. As the company grows, the company expects the volume of resumes to exceed the company's review capacity. question_cn: 某公司人工审核所有PDF格式的简历，随着公司规模扩大，简历量将超出人工审核能力。公司需要自动化系统将PDF简历转换为纯文本格式以便后续处理，哪项AWS服务能满足该需求？

question_en: (多选题)An education provider is building a question and answer application that uses a generative AI model to explain complex concepts. The education provider wants to automatically change the style of the model response depending on who is asking the question. The education provider will give the model the age range of the user who has asked the question. Which solution meets these requirements with the LEAST implementation effort? (Note: Original question has single correct answer in the bank, marked as multiple by error, adjusted to single here)
question_cn: 某教育机构正在构建问答应用，通过生成式AI模型解释复杂概念，希望能根据提问者自动调整模型回复风格，且会向模型传入提问用户的年龄范围。哪种解决方案能以最低的实现成本满足需求？

options_en.A: Fine tune the model by using additional training data that is representative of the various age ranges that the application will support.
options_en.B: Add a role description to the prompt context that instructs the model of the age range that the response should target.
options_en.C: Use chain-of-thought reasoning to deduce the correct style and complexity for a response suitable for that user.
options_en.D: Summarize the response text depending on the age of the user so that younger users receive shorter responses.

options_cn.A: 使用能代表应用所支持的各年龄段的额外训练数据微调模型。
options_cn.B: 在提示词上下文中添加角色描述，告知模型回复需适配的年龄范围。
options_cn.C: 使用思维链推理推导适合该用户的回复风格和复杂度。
options_cn.D: 根据用户年龄汇总回复文本，让低龄用户收到更简短的回复。

question_en: A company is building a chatbot to improve user experience. The company is using a large language model (LLM) from Amazon Bedrock for intent detection. options_cn.B: 用户消息与正确聊天机器人回复的配对数据

question_en: A company is using few-shot prompting on a base model that is hosted on Amazon Bedrock. The model currently uses 10 examples in the prompt.The model is invoked once daily and is performing well. The company wants to lower the monthly cost. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options_en.A: Customize the model by using fine-tuning.
options_en.B: Decrease the number of tokens in the prompt.
options_en.C: Increase the number of tokens in the prompt.

options_cn.B: 减少提示词中的令牌数量。
options_cn.C: 增加提示词中的令牌数量。

question_en: An AI practitioner trained a custom model on Amazon Bedrock by using a training dataset that contains confidential data. The AI practitioner wants to ensure that the custom model does not generate inference responses based on confidential data. How should the AI practitioner prevent responses based on confidential data?
question_cn: 一名AI从业者使用包含机密数据的训练数据集在Amazon Bedrock上训练了自定义模型，希望确保该模型在推理时不会基于机密数据生成回复。从业者应如何防止模型输出涉及机密数据的内容？

options_en.A: Delete the custom model. Remove the confidential data from the training dataset. Retrain the custom model.

options_cn.A: 删除自定义模型，从训练数据集中移除机密数据后重新训练。
options_cn.B: 通过动态数据脱敏技术对推理回复中的机密数据进行掩码处理。
options_cn.C: 使用Amazon SageMaker加密推理回复中的机密数据。
options_cn.D: 使用AWS密钥管理服务（AWS KMS）加密自定义模型中的机密数据。

question_en: What are tokens in the context of generative AI models?

options_en.A: Tokens are the basic units of input and output that a generative AI model operates on, representing words, subwords, or other linguistic units.

options_en.C: Tokens are the pre-trained weights of a generative AI model that are fine-tuned for specific tasks.
options_en.D: Tokens are the specific prompts or instructions given to a generative AI model to generate output.

question_en: (问答题)A company is using a generative AI model to develop a digital assistant. The model's responses occasionally include undesirable and potentially harmful content. Select the correct Amazon Bedrock filter policy from the following list for each mitigation action. Each filter policy should be selected one time. (Select FOUR.)
question_cn: (问答题)某公司正在使用生成式AI模型开发数字助手，该模型的回复偶尔会包含不当且具有潜在危害的内容。请为以下每项缓解措施从列表中选择对应的Amazon Bedrock过滤策略，每种策略仅可选择一次。（选择四项）

options_en.缓解措施1: Block input prompts or model responses that contain harmful content such as hate, insults, violence, or misconduct
options_en.缓解措施2: Avoid subjects related to illegal investment advice or legal advice
options_en.缓解措施3: Detect and block specific offensive terms
options_en.缓解措施4: Detect and filter out information in the model's responses that is not grounded in the provided source information

options_cn.缓解措施1: 拦截包含仇恨言论、辱骂、暴力或不当行为等有害内容的输入提示词或模型回复
options_cn.缓解措施2: 规避与非法投资建议或法律咨询相关的话题
options_cn.缓解措施3: 检测并拦截特定攻击性词汇
options_cn.缓解措施4: 检测并过滤模型回复中与提供的源信息无关的内容

answer_en: 缓解措施1: Content filters; 缓解措施2: Denied topics; 缓解措施3: Word filters; 缓解措施4: Contextual grounding check
answer_cn: 缓解措施1：内容过滤器；缓解措施2：禁止话题；缓解措施3：词汇过滤器；缓解措施4：上下文关联性校验

question_en: (问答题)A company wants more customized responses to its generative AI models' prompts. Select the correct customization methodology from the following list for each use case. Each use case should be selected one time. (Select THREE.)
question_cn: (问答题)某公司希望其生成式AI模型的提示词能得到更定制化的回复。请为以下每个场景从列表中选择对应的定制方法，每个场景仅可选择一次。（选择三项）

options_en.场景1: The models must be taught a new domain-specific task
options_en.场景2: A limited amount of labeled data is available and more data is needed

options_cn.场景1: 需让模型掌握新的特定领域任务
options_cn.场景2: 仅有少量标记数据，且需要更多数据

answer_en: 场景1: Model fine-tuning; 场景2: Data augmentation; 场景3: Continued pre-training
answer_cn: 场景1：模型微调；场景2：数据增强；场景3：持续预训练

question_en: A retail company is tagging its product inventory. A tag is automatically assigned to each product based on the product description. The company created one product category by using a large language model (LLM) on Amazon Bedrock in few-shot learning mode. The company collected a labeled dataset and wants to scale the solution to all product categories. Which solution meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某零售公司正在为商品库存打标签，会基于商品描述自动为每件商品分配标签。该公司已通过Amazon Bedrock的大语言模型（LLM）以少样本学习模式创建了一个商品分类，且已收集到标记数据集，希望将该方案扩展至所有商品分类。哪种解决方案能满足需求？

options_en.A: Use prompt engineering with zero-shot learning.
options_en.B: Use prompt engineering with prompt templates.
options_en.C: Customize the model with continued pre-training.

options_cn.A: 结合零样本学习使用提示词工程
options_cn.B: 结合提示词模板使用提示词工程
options_cn.C: 通过持续预训练定制模型

The company also wants to observe if the model quality drifts. Which AWS service or feature meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某媒体公司希望分析观众行为和人口统计数据以提供个性化内容推荐，计划在生产环境部署定制化机器学习模型，同时希望监控模型质量是否发生漂移。哪种AWS服务或功能能满足需求？

options_cn.B: Amazon SageMaker Clarify可解释性工具

question_cn: 一名AI从业者正在构建机器学习模型，希望向利益相关者提供模型的透明度和可解释性。哪种解决方案能满足需求？

options_en.D: Provide a secure model inference endpoint.

options_en.B: Classifying customers based on product usage
options_en.C: Segmenting customers based on type of investments

options_cn.B: 基于产品使用情况对客户进行分类
options_cn.C: 基于投资类型对客户进行分群

question_en: Which option is a characteristic of transformer-based language models?
question_cn: 以下哪项是基于Transformer的语言模型的特征？

options_en.A: Transformer-based language models use convolutional layers to apply filters across an input to capture local through filtered views.
options_en.B: Transformer-based language models can process only text data.
options_en.C: Transformer-based language models use self-attention mechanisms to capture contextual relationships.
options_en.D: Transformer-based language models process data sequences one element at a time in cyclic iterations.

options_cn.A: 基于Transformer的语言模型使用卷积层对输入数据应用过滤器，通过过滤视图捕捉局部特征
options_cn.B: 基于Transformer的语言模型仅能处理文本数据
options_cn.C: 基于Transformer的语言模型使用自注意力机制捕捉上下文关联关系
options_cn.D: 基于Transformer的语言模型以循环迭代的方式逐个处理数据序列中的元素

question_en: A trading company wants to use a large language model (LLM) for financial market forecasts based on daily market data, news, and company reports. Which solution meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某贸易公司希望使用大语言模型（LLM），基于每日市场数据、新闻和公司报告开展金融市场预测。哪种解决方案能满足需求？

options_en.A: Fine-tune the LLM on a domain-specific dataset until the LLM achieves 100% accuracy.
options_en.B: Pick a general purpose LLM without modifications.
options_en.C: Pick a general purpose LLM after evaluating the LLM on a test dataset.
options_en.D: Continually pre-train an LLM on domain-specific knowledge.

options_cn.A: 基于特定领域数据集微调LLM，直至其达到100%准确率
options_cn.B: 直接使用未经修改的通用LLM
options_cn.C: 在测试数据集上评估通用LLM后再进行选型
options_cn.D: 基于特定领域知识对LLM进行持续预训练

question_en: A retail company wants to build an ML model to recommend products to customers. The company wants to build the model based on responsible practices. Which practice should the company apply when collecting data to decrease model bias?
question_cn: 某零售公司希望构建机器学习模型为客户推荐商品，且希望基于负责任的实践构建该模型。在数据收集阶段，公司应采取哪种做法来降低模型偏差？

options_en.A: Use data from only customers who match the demographics of the company's overall customer base.
options_en.B: Collect data from customers who have a past purchase history.
options_en.C: Ensure that the data is balanced and collected from a diverse group.
options_en.D: Ensure that the data is from a publicly available dataset.

options_cn.A: 仅使用与公司整体客户群体人口统计特征匹配的客户数据
options_cn.B: 仅收集有过往购买记录的客户数据
options_cn.C: 确保数据均衡且从多样化群体中收集
options_cn.D: 确保数据来自公开可用的数据集

question_en: An AI practitioner wants to deploy a chatbot that can assist customer service representatives by answering questions. The chatbot uses a large language model (LLM)｡ The chatbot needs to produce fine-grained responses based on evolving product documentation. Which solution meets these requirements?
question_cn: 一名AI从业者希望部署聊天机器人，辅助客服人员解答客户疑问，该机器人基于大语言模型（LLM）构建，且需要基于不断更新的产品文档生成精细化回复。哪种解决方案能满足需求？

options_en.A: Apply continuous pre-training with product documentation to build a custom model.
options_en.B: Use product documentation with Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) to update the knowledge base.
options_en.C: Use transfer learning to train a generalized model on various product domains.
options_en.D: Collaborate with research institutions to develop a new foundation model (FM)｡

options_cn.A: 结合产品文档开展持续预训练，构建自定义模型
options_cn.B: 将产品文档接入检索增强生成（RAG）以更新知识库
options_cn.C: 使用迁移学习在多产品领域训练通用模型
options_cn.D: 与研究机构合作开发新的基础模型（FM）

question_cn: 某金融公司在贷款申请流程中使用AI系统获取客户信用评分，现计划拓展至其他地区的新市场，需确保能在该地区合规运营。公司应查阅哪些合规法规？

options_en.B: Sets up and optimizes AWS Infrastructure for the live production environment

options_en.B: Compare the output of the large language model (LLM) to the results of an internet search.

question_cn: (多选题)某公司在Amazon S3存储桶中存储了数百万份PDF文档，需从PDF中提取文本、生成文本摘要并为摘要建立索引以实现快速搜索。哪些AWS服务组合能满足需求？（选择两项）

question_cn: 某食品服务公司希望收集数据集以预测客户的饮食偏好，需确保数据中涵盖所有人群的饮食偏好。该场景体现了数据集的哪项特性？

question_en: Which scenario describes a potential risk and limitation of prompt engineering in the context of a generative AI model?
question_cn: 以下哪个场景描述了生成式AI模型中提示词工程的潜在风险与局限性？

options_en.A: Prompt engineering does not ensure that the model always produces consistent and deterministic outputs, eliminating the need for validation.
options_en.B: Prompt engineering could expose the model to vulnerabilities such as prompt injection attacks.
options_en.C: Properly designed prompts reduce but do not eliminate the risk of data poisoning or model hijacking.
options_en.D: Prompt engineering does not ensure that the model will consistently generate highly reliable outputs when working with real-world data.

options_cn.A: 提示词工程无法确保模型始终生成一致且确定的输出，因此无需再进行验证
options_cn.B: 提示词工程可能使模型面临提示词注入攻击等安全漏洞
options_cn.C: 设计良好的提示词可降低但无法消除数据投毒或模型劫持的风险
options_cn.D: 在处理真实世界数据时，提示词工程无法确保模型持续生成高可靠性输出

question_en: A company is creating an agent for its application by using Amazon Bedrock Agents. The agent is performing well, but the company wants to improve the agent's accuracy by providing some specific examples. Which solution meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司正在通过Amazon Bedrock智能代理为其应用构建代理，该代理当前表现良好，但公司希望通过提供特定示例进一步提升其准确率。哪种解决方案能满足需求？

options_en.A: Modify the advanced prompts for the agent to include the examples.
options_en.B: Create a guardrail for the agent that includes the examples.
options_en.C: Use Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth to label the examples.
options_en.D: Run a script in AWS Lambda that adds the examples to the training dataset.

options_cn.A: 修改代理的高级提示词，将示例纳入其中
options_cn.B: 为代理创建包含示例的内容防护规则
options_cn.C: 使用Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth为示例打标签
options_cn.D: 在AWS Lambda中运行脚本，将示例添加至训练数据集

The company will use Amazon Bedrock and prompt engineering to improve the chatbot's responses. Which prompt engineering technique meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某银行正在构建聊天机器人，解答客户关于开立银行账户的疑问，该机器人将基于银行公开文档生成回复。公司计划通过Amazon Bedrock和提示词工程提升机器人回复质量。哪种提示词工程技术能满足需求？

options_cn.A: 基于复杂度的提示词技术

question_en: What is continued pre-training?
question_cn: 什么是持续预训练？

options_en.A: The process of fine-tuning a pre-trained language model on labeled data for a specific task
options_en.B: The process of providing unlabeled data to a pre-trained language model to improve the model's domain knowledge
options_en.C: The process of training a language model from the beginning on a specific dataset
options_en.D: The process of evaluating the performance of a pre-trained language model on a test set

options_cn.A: 在标记数据上对预训练语言模型进行微调，使其适配特定任务的过程
options_cn.B: 向预训练语言模型输入未标记数据，以提升模型领域知识的过程
options_cn.C: 基于特定数据集从零开始训练语言模型的过程
options_cn.D: 在测试集上评估预训练语言模型性能的过程

question_en: What is the purpose of chunking in Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)?
question_cn: 在检索增强生成（RAG）中，分块（chunking）的目的是什么？

options_en.A: To avoid database storage limitations for large text documents by storing parts or chunks of the text
options_en.B: To improve efficiency by avoiding the need to convert large text into vector embeddings
options_en.C: To improve the contextual relevancy of results retrieved from the vector index
options_en.D: To decrease the cost of storage by storing parts or chunks of the text

options_cn.A: 通过存储大文本的部分片段来规避数据库的存储限制
options_cn.B: 通过避免将大文本转换为向量嵌入来提升效率
options_cn.C: 提升从向量索引中检索到的结果的上下文相关性
options_cn.D: 通过存储文本片段来降低存储成本

question_en: An ecommerce company wants to improve search engine recommendations by customizing the results for each user of the company's ecommerce platform. Which AWS service meets these requirements?
question_cn: 一家电商公司希望通过为其电商平台的每位用户定制搜索结果，来优化搜索引擎推荐功能。哪项AWS服务能满足这一需求？

options_cn.A: Amazon Personalize（亚马逊个性化推荐服务）
options_cn.B: Amazon Kendra（亚马逊企业搜索服务）
options_cn.C: Amazon Rekognition（亚马逊图像识别服务）
options_cn.D: Amazon Transcribe（亚马逊语音转文本服务）

question_en: An ecommerce company is using a chatbot to automate the customer order submission process. The chatbot is powered by AI and is available to customers directly from the company's website 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Which option is an AI system Input vulnerability that the company needs to resolve before the chatbot is made available?
question_cn: 一家电商公司正在使用聊天机器人自动化客户订单提交流程。该聊天机器人由AI驱动，可通过公司网站每周7天、每天24小时为客户提供服务。在聊天机器人上线前，公司需要解决的AI系统输入漏洞是哪一项？

question_en: An AI practitioner is training an ML model on a large dataset of financial market data to predict stock prices. The model is overfitting and generating incorrect predictions. Which parameter should the AI practitioner adjust to improve prediction accuracy?
question_cn: 一名AI从业者正在使用大量金融市场数据训练机器学习模型以预测股票价格，该模型出现了过拟合现象，导致预测结果不准确。AI从业者应调整哪个参数来提高预测准确率？

question_en: A large retailer receives thousands of customer support inquires about products every day. The customer support inquires need to be processed quickly. The company wants to implement Agents for Amazon Bedrock. What are the key benefits of using Amazon Bedrock agents that could help this retailer?
question_cn: 一家大型零售商每天收到数千条关于产品的客户咨询，这些咨询需要快速处理。该公司希望部署Amazon Bedrock智能体（Agents for Amazon Bedrock）。使用Amazon Bedrock智能体的哪些核心优势能帮助这家零售商？

options_en.A: Generation of custom foundation models (FMs) to predict customer needs
options_en.B: Automation of repetitive tasks and orchestration of complex workflows
options_en.C: Automatically calling multiple foundation models (FMs) and consolidating the results
options_en.D: Selecting the foundation model (FM) based on predefined criteria and metrics

options_cn.A: 生成自定义基础模型（FM）以预测客户需求
options_cn.B: 自动化重复任务并编排复杂工作流
options_cn.C: 自动调用多个基础模型（FM）并整合结果
options_cn.D: 基于预定义的标准和指标选择基础模型（FM）

question_en: A hospital developed an AI system to provide personalized treatment recommendations for patients. The AI system must provide the rationale behind the recommendations and make the insights accessible to doctors and patients. Which human-centered design principle does this scenario present?
question_cn: 某医院开发了一套AI系统，为患者提供个性化治疗建议。该AI系统必须提供建议背后的理由，并让医生和患者都能理解这些决策依据。这种场景体现了哪项以人为中心的设计原则？

question_en: A food service company wants to collect a dataset to predict customer food preferences. The company wants to ensure that the food preferences of all demographics are Included In the data. Which dataset characteristic does this scenario present?
question_cn: 某餐饮服务公司希望收集一个数据集来预测客户的食物偏好，该公司确保数据中包含所有人口统计特征的食物偏好。这种场景体现了数据集的哪项特征？

question_en: A company wants to enhance response quality for a large language model (LLM) for complex problem-solving tasks. The tasks require detailed reasoning and a step-by-step explanation process. Which prompt engineering technique meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司希望提升大语言模型（LLM）在复杂问题解决任务中的响应质量，这些任务需要详细的推理和分步解释过程。哪种提示词工程技术能满足这一需求？

question_en: A company makes electronic record software. Users sometimes enter incomplete sentences in the records. The company wants to use ML to automatically complete the sentences. Which solution meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司开发了电子记录软件，用户有时会在记录中输入不完整的句子。该公司希望使用机器学习自动补全这些句子。哪种方案能满足这一需求？

options_en.A: Use a large language model（LLM）trained on data from the records.
options_en.B: Use a computer vision model trained on images and related metadata.
options_en.C: Use a k-nearest neighbors （k-NN）algorithm to classify input terms.
options_en.D: Use reinforcement learning with input data to produce full sentences.

options_cn.A: 使用经过记录数据训练的大语言模型（LLM）。
options_cn.B: 使用经过图像及相关元数据训练的计算机视觉模型。
options_cn.C: 使用K近邻（k-NN）算法对输入术语进行分类。
options_cn.D: 使用强化学习结合输入数据生成完整句子。

question_en: Which type of AI model makes numeric predictions?
question_cn: 哪种类型的AI模型用于进行数值预测？

question_en: A company needs to automate the discovery of sensitive data in an Amazon S3 bucket. Which solution will meet this requirement?
question_cn: 某公司需要自动发现Amazon S3存储桶中的敏感数据。哪种方案能满足这一需求？

options_en.A: Configure S3 Object Lambda for the S3 bucket.
options_en.B: Configure server-side encryption with AWS KMS keys（SSE-KMS）for the S3 bucket.
options_en.C: Configure Amazon CloudWatch arms for the S3 bucket.
options_en.D: Configure Amazon Macie for the S3 bucket.

options_cn.A: 为S3存储桶配置S3 Object Lambda。
options_cn.B: 为S3存储桶配置基于AWS KMS密钥的服务器端加密（SSE-KMS）。
options_cn.C: 为S3存储桶配置Amazon CloudWatch告警。

question_en: A company deployed a model to production. After 4 months, the model inference quality degraded. The company wants to receive a notification if the model inference quality degrades. The company also wants to ensure that the problem does not happen again. Which solution will meet these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司已将一个模型部署到生产环境，4个月后，模型推理质量下降。该公司希望在模型推理质量下降时收到通知，并确保此类问题不再发生。哪种方案能满足这些需求？

options_en.A: Retrain the model. Monitor model drift by using Amazon SageMaker Clarify.
options_en.B: Retrain the model. Monitor model drift by using Amazon SageMaker Model Monitor.
options_en.C: Build a new model. Monitor model drift by using Amazon SageMaker Feature Store.
options_en.D: Build a new model. Monitor model drift by using Amazon SageMaker JumpStart.

options_cn.A: 重新训练模型，使用Amazon SageMaker Clarify监控模型漂移。
options_cn.B: 重新训练模型，使用Amazon SageMaker Model Monitor监控模型漂移。
options_cn.C: 构建新模型，使用Amazon SageMaker Feature Store监控模型漂移。
options_cn.D: 构建新模型，使用Amazon SageMaker JumpStart监控模型漂移。

question_en: A company wants to use Amazon SageMaker features for various use cases. Select the correct SageMaker feature from the following list for each use case. Each SageMaker feature should be selected one time or not at all. (Select THREE.)Preparing data through a visual interface without using code(A)，Finding and using a prebuilt solution for fraud detection(B )Create labeled datasets with human intervention ( C)
question_cn: 某公司希望为不同的业务场景使用Amazon SageMaker的各项功能。请从下列列表中为每个场景选择正确的SageMaker功能，每个功能最多选择一次或不选。（选择三项）

question_en: A company needs to monitor the performance of its ML systems by using a highly scalable AWS service. Which AWS service meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司需要使用一款高可扩展性的AWS服务，监控其机器学习系统的性能。哪项AWS服务能满足这一需求？

options_cn.A: Amazon CloudWatch（亚马逊云监控服务）

question_en: Which AWS service makes foundation models (FMs) available to help users build and scale generative AI applications?
question_cn: 哪项AWS服务提供基础模型（FM），帮助用户构建并扩展生成式AI应用？

question_en: A company wants to develop ML applications to improve business operations and efficiency. Select the correct ML paradigm from the following list for each use case. Each ML paradigm should be selected one or more times
question_cn: 某公司希望开发机器学习应用以提升业务运营效率。请从下列列表中为每个用例选择正确的机器学习范式，每种范式可选择一次或多次。

options_en.C: K-means clustering: Unsupervised Learning（无监督学习）
options_en.D: Dimensionality reduction: Supervised Learning（监督学习）

options_cn.C: K-means clustering: Unsupervised Learning（无监督学习）
options_cn.D: Dimensionality reduction: Supervised Learning（监督学习）

question_en: An ecommerce company is using a generative AI chatbot to respond to customer inquiries. The company wants to measure the financial effect of the chatbot on the company's operations. Which metric should the company use?
question_cn: 某电商公司正在使用生成式AI聊天机器人响应客户咨询，希望衡量该聊天机器人对公司运营的财务影响。该公司应使用哪项指标？

question_en: A company wants to find groups for its customers based on the customers' demographics and buying patterns. Which algorithm should the company use to meet this requirement?
question_cn: 某公司希望根据客户的人口统计特征和购买行为模式，对客户进行分组。该公司应使用哪种算法来满足这一需求？

question_en: A company's employees provide product descriptions and recommendations to customers when customers call the customer service center. These recommendations are based on where the customers are located. The company wants to use foundation models (FMs) to automate this process. Which AWS service meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司的员工在客户致电客服中心时，为客户提供产品描述和推荐，这些推荐基于客户所在的地理位置。该公司希望使用基础模型（FM）实现此流程的自动化。哪项AWS服务能满足这一需求？

options_cn.A: Amazon Macie（亚马逊数据隐私保护服务）
options_cn.B: Amazon Transcribe（亚马逊语音转文本服务）
options_cn.C: Amazon Bedrock（亚马逊基础模型服务）
options_cn.D: Amazon Textract（亚马逊文档文本提取服务）

question_en: A company wants to upload customer service email messages to Amazon S3 to develop a business analysis application. The messages sometimes contain sensitive data. The company wants to receive an alert every time sensitive information is found. Which solution fully automates the sensitive information detection process with the LEAST development effort?
question_cn: 某公司计划将客户服务邮件上传至Amazon S3，用于开发业务分析应用。这些邮件中有时会包含敏感数据，公司希望每次发现敏感信息时都能收到告警。哪种方案能以最少的开发工作量，实现敏感信息检测流程的完全自动化？

options_en.A: Configure Amazon Macie to detect sensitive information in the documents that are uploaded to Amazon S3.
options_en.B: Use Amazon SageMaker endpoints to deploy a large language model (LLM) to redact sensitive data.
options_en.C: Develop multiple regex patterns to detect sensitive data. Expose the regex patterns on an Amazon SageMaker notebook.
options_en.D: Ask the customers to avoid sharing sensitive information in their email messages.

options_cn.A: 配置Amazon Macie，检测上传至Amazon S3的文档中的敏感信息。
options_cn.B: 使用Amazon SageMaker端点部署大语言模型（LLM），以脱敏敏感数据。
options_cn.C: 开发多个正则表达式模式来检测敏感数据，并在Amazon SageMaker笔记本中公开这些正则表达式。
options_cn.D: 要求客户避免在邮件中分享敏感信息。

question_en: A company is training its employees on how to structure prompts for foundation models. Select the correct prompt engineering technique from the following list for each prompt template. Each prompt engineering technique should be selected one time.
question_cn: 某公司正在对员工进行基础模型提示词构建培训。请从下列列表中为每个提示词模板选择正确的提示词工程技巧，每种技巧只能选择一次。

question_en: A global financial company has developed an ML application to analyze stock market data and provide stock market trends. The company wants to continuously monitor the application development phases and to ensure that company policies and industry regulations are followed. Which AWS services will help the company assess compliance requirements? (Choose two.)
question_cn: 某全球金融公司开发了一款机器学习应用，用于分析股市数据并提供股市趋势。该公司希望持续监控应用开发阶段，确保符合公司政策和行业监管要求。哪些AWS服务可帮助该公司评估合规性要求？（选择两项）

options_cn.C: Amazon Inspector（亚马逊漏洞扫描服务）

question_en: A company wants to identify harmful language in the comments section of social media posts by using an ML model. The company will not use labeled data to train the model. Which strategy should the company use to identify harmful language?
question_cn: 某公司希望使用机器学习模型识别社交媒体帖子评论区中的有害语言，且该公司不打算使用标记数据来训练模型。该公司应采用哪种策略识别有害语言？

options_en.C: Use Amazon SageMaker built-in algorithms to train the model.
options_en.D: Use Amazon Polly to monitor comments.

options_cn.A: 使用Amazon Rekognition内容审核功能。
options_cn.B: 使用Amazon Comprehend毒性检测功能。
options_cn.C: 使用Amazon SageMaker内置算法训练模型。
options_cn.D: 使用Amazon Polly监控评论内容。

question_en: A company is deploying AI/ML models by using AWS services. The company wants to offer transparency into the models’ decision-making processes and provide explanations for the model outputs. Which AWS service or feature meets these requirements?
question_cn: 某公司正在使用AWS服务部署AI/ML模型，希望提升模型决策流程的透明度，并为模型输出提供解释说明。哪项AWS服务或功能能满足此需求？

options_cn.A: Amazon SageMaker Model Cards（亚马逊SageMaker模型卡片）
options_cn.B: Amazon Rekognition（亚马逊图像识别服务）
options_cn.C: Amazon Comprehend（亚马逊自然语言处理服务）
options_cn.D: Amazon Lex（亚马逊对话式AI服务）

question_en: A manufacturing company wants to create product descriptions in multiple languages. Which AWS service will automate this task?
question_cn: 某制造企业希望创建多语言的产品说明，哪种AWS服务可以自动化完成此任务？

options_cn.B: Amazon Transcribe（亚马逊语音转文字服务）
options_cn.C: Amazon Kendra（亚马逊智能搜索服务）
options_cn.D: Amazon Polly（亚马逊文字转语音服务）
